ygData.subject: Re: Losing Pets
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I noticed one disturbing thing on Test Server though, there were a TON of enchanters on it.  They were mostly low lvl too, meaning other people are
ygData.messageBody:
> They would
> have to give us something REALLY good to make up for
> taking away our pets if
> they decided to do that. Although I can see it in
> one place. The Race Wars
> server. We will RULE the race war server. With the
> ablitity to blind,
> root, and change forms we can effectivly be that
> assassins of the Race War.
> That, or if you choose we are the only class that
> can travel anywhere and
> not be attacked as some as someone sees us.
>
> Mark
I noticed one disturbing thing on Test Server though,
there were a TON of enchanters on it. They were
mostly low lvl too, meaning other people are thinking
along the same lines we are.

===
------------------------------------------------
Fozzle Brainbender
Minister of the Winds
Spirit of the Moon
Enchanter, Jeweler, Short guy
